definition: physics and chemistry/to govern and educate
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
abbr. for mathematics 數學|数学[shu4 xue2], physics 物理[wu4 li3] and chemistry 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: 'They only pay attention to physics, mathematics and chemistry, ' says Mr. Pei.
sentences.chinese: 裴東光說，他們只關心數理化。

sentences.english: The effect of super micro-milling on physical chemistry and functional properties of tartary buckwheat bran was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了超微粉碎處理對苦蕎麩理化和功能特性的影響。

sentences.english: Typically the rock is massive , but commonly it is flaggy or schistose .
sentences.chinese: 這類岩石典型地呈塊狀，但常呈薄板狀或片理化。

sentences.english: It would be interesting to hear what their rationalizations are.
sentences.chinese: 聽聽他們合理化的做法也是一件蠻有趣味的事情。

sentences.english: Seawater, hyperosmotic and alkaline, is a complex wound factor.
sentences.chinese: 海水呈高滲鹼性，是一種複合理化致傷因子。

sentences.english: Physicochemical properties and fatty acid compositions of jujube kernel oil were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對酸棗仁油的理化性質和脂肪酸組成進行了分析。

sentences.english: Soil conditioner can improve physical and chemical characteristics of soil effectively.
sentences.chinese: 土壤調理劑能有效改善土壤理化性質。

sentences.english: Man is not a rational animal, but a rationalizing animal.
sentences.chinese: 人類並非理性的動物，而是善於合理化的動物。

sentences.english: Its physicochemical properties and spectrometry proved the compound was psoralidin.
sentences.chinese: 理化性質和波譜分析證明該化合物爲補骨脂裏定。

sentences.english: And the way of resolving internal conflicts is by organizing the external environment.
sentences.chinese: 他們需要通過使外部環境條理化來解決內在衝突。

sentences.english: The rationalization proposal about preservation the ginkgo seeds after harvest is suggested in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 並對廣東白果的採後保鮮提出合理化建議。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a method for evaluation of physiochemical characteristics and the stability of Alliin substance.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立蒜氨酸原料藥理化性質和穩定性的評價方法。

sentences.english: The experiment systematically studied the physical, chemical properties and stability of the pigment from Ligustrum sinense Lour.
sentences.chinese: 對小蠟色素的理化性質和穩定性進行研究。

sentences.english: Their physical and chemical properties all reach the standards of the State and the Ministry.
sentences.chinese: 各項理化指標均達到部標和國標。

sentences.english: Physical and chemical examination prompted with the Chinese sub-type between a certain degree of correlation.
sentences.chinese: 提示理化檢查與中醫分型之間有一定的對應關係。

sentences.english: We have a complete physical and chemical detection equipment and specialist testing personnel.
sentences.chinese: 擁有完整的理化檢測設備和本專科檢測試驗人員。

definition: abbr. for mathematics 數學|数学[shu4 xue2], physics 物理[wu4 li3] and chemistry 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
the sciences (as opposed to the humanities 文科[wen2 ke1])
literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
